modal.title: Hi, I'm Gya!
modal.text:
If you are between <1>01 and 63 years old I guarantee I can guess your age!
Just answer my questions sincerely.
Shall we?

final.title:
I did it! I know your age!
Can I reveal it?!

questions.telefone_publico: Do you know what a payphone is?
questions.internet_discada: Have you ever used dial-up internet?
questions.orkut: Do you remember the Orkut era?
questions.locadora: Have you ever rented a movie at a video store?
questions.cartoon: Did you watch classic cartoons on TV?
questions.super_nintendo: Have you ever played Super Nintendo?
questions.celular_antena: Did you use a cell phone with an antenna?
questions.fita_cassete: Did you listen to music on cassette tapes?
questions.bts: Do you know what BTS is?
questions.tiktok_todos_dias: Do you use TikTok every day?
questions.trap: Do you know what Trap is?
questions.influencer_ao_vivo: Have you ever seen an influencer live?
questions.dancinha: Have you ever done a dance on Reels or TikTok?
questions.shopee: Have you ever shopped on Shopee?
questions.canal_youtube_tiktok: Do you have a YouTube or TikTok channel?
questions.twitch: Do you watch streams on Twitch?

numberQuestions.1: Is your age among these numbers?
numberQuestions.2: Do you see your age in this list?
numberQuestions.4: Does your age appear among these?
numberQuestions.5: Do you recognize your age in these numbers?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: This site uses Google AdSense to display ads, which may collect anonymous data for personalization and statistics. We do not use our own cookies for tracking or collecting personal data.
privacy.p2: By browsing this site, you agree to the use of these technologies as described in this policy. We do not collect personally identifiable data without your consent.
privacy.contact: For questions or requests, contact us at: <1>guivieiradm@gmail.com</1>

share.text: Look, Gya guessed my age! Can she guess yours? Try it!

about.title: About Gya
about.gya: Gya was born from the desire to surprise in a playful and fun way, bringing to the digital world a classic math game: guessing people's age with just yes or no questions. The goal is to provide a light, curious, and unique experience, showing that math can be magical and enchanting when applied creatively.
about.dezembro19: Guilherme Vieira has always been fascinated by fast web games and experiences that spark curiosity about how things work. He became a web developer in 2023 and has since been honing his skills, giving life to Dezembro 19 Tecnologia. The mission is to turn ideas into creative and accessible solutions, making technology an ally to surprise and delight people.

questions_image_alt.celular_antena: Old cell phone with antenna image

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.p1: Gya respects your privacy. We do not collect sensitive personal data such as name, real age, or contacts. The answers provided during the game are processed only locally, in your browser, and are not stored on our servers. We use cookies and similar technologies only to improve your experience and for anonymous statistical purposes, such as Google Analytics and Google ads. We do not share your information with third parties, except when required by law. By using Gya, you agree to this policy. For questions, contact us at <1>guivieiradm@gmail.com</1>.
privacyPage.ads: We display Google ads to keep the project free. Google may collect browsing data to personalize ads, according to its own privacy policy.
privacyPage.security: We take measures to protect your browsing, but remember: never share sensitive personal information in online games.

howToPlay.title: How to play
howToPlay.intro: It's very simple! To play with Gya, you just need to be between 01 and 63 years old. You will answer yes or no questions about experiences and also about numbers. When a number card appears, look carefully and see if your age is among the numbers shown. Always answer sincerely, as this is essential for the magic to work and for Gya to guess your age at the end. Have fun and challenge your friends!
instructions: Answer YES or NO to each question presented.
On number cards, check if your age appears in the list before answering.
At the end, Gya will reveal your age!

support.title: Support Gya
support.text: Gya is an independent game, created to entertain and spark curiosity. If you'd like to help with a donation, Dezembro 19's Pix is:
support.thanks: Any amount is welcome and will be greatly appreciated!
